```{r}
library(ggplot2)
# boxplot
b1 <- gopher %>% filter(term == "(Intercept)")%>%select("estimate") %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=estimate))+ 
  geom_boxplot()+
  xlab("Year")+
  ylab("number of shells")
b1
```
